## Quaternion.RotationQuaternionFromAxisToRef() method

Creates a rotation value to reach the target (axis1, axis2, axis3) orientation as a rotated XYZ system (axis1, axis2 and axis3 are normalized during this operation) and stores it in the target quaternion

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static RotationQuaternionFromAxisToRef(axis1: Vector3, axis2: Vector3, axis3: Vector3, ref: Quaternion): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  axis1 | <code>Vector3</code> | defines the first axis |
|  axis2 | <code>Vector3</code> | defines the second axis |
|  axis3 | <code>Vector3</code> | defines the third axis |
|  ref | <code>Quaternion</code> | defines the target quaternion |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
